Package AiController

Class AiController

  • java.lang.Object
    • AiController.AiController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AiControllerInterface
    public class AiController
extends java.lang.Object
implements AiControllerInterface
    The controller manages the AI. From here, messages are sent to the server using the NetClient and calculations are coordinated.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AiController​(NetClient client, java.lang.String clientName)
      The login to the server is checked and a parser to process incoming messages from the server.
